markdownRemark.excerpt: Well. That was interesting. It’s COVID-19 lockdown day 3 here in New Zealand. Discombobulating times. I could blame my inactivity in personal learning projects…
markdownRemark.html:
Well. That was interesting.

It’s COVID-19 lockdown day 3 here in New Zealand. Discombobulating times. I could blame my inactivity in personal learning projects entirely on SARS-COV-2, but the truth is I’ve been conking out pretty early and consuming content without creating any. I hate that: feels like empty time.

So, let’s see how many of these crisis days I can fill with creativity, when I’m not at my ‘day job’. Since I’m already a remote worker, I haven’t had to make too many adjustments in that department and I have absolutely no excuse not to stretch into learning a bit more.

I think we’re up to Chapter Five.

Ooo, field of view is interesting. But this room algorithm creates very tall, skinny rooms!
